001/**
002 * This file reads the information necessary to connect to the database
003 * @author Shruti Oruganti
004 */
005package src.database;
006
007import java.io.IOException;
008import java.io.InputStream;
009import java.util.Properties;
010
011public final class dbSetup  {
012  public static final String user;
013  public static final String pswd;
014  static {
015    Properties props = new Properties();
016    try (InputStream input = dbSetup.class.getResourceAsStream("dbConfig.properties")) {
017        if (input == null) {
018            throw new IOException("Config file not found: " + "dbConfig.properties");
019        }
020        props.load(input);
021    } catch (IOException e) {
022        throw new RuntimeException("Error loading database config file", e);
023    }
024    user = props.getProperty("db.user");
025    pswd = props.getProperty("db.password");
026  }
027}
